label: 百姓
本: The Emergence of Japanese Kingship . Stanford University Press . 1997
説明文: Persons with family names who were free persons," as distinguished from members of dependent groups such as be or slaves. Such free persons were declared subjects of the tennō's realm by the ritsuryō codes. As such they received official fields to cultivate and were subject to tribute levies. [天皇、律令] "
